short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for registered MonthlyBillz web app users, to add new subscriptions details

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is a companion app for registered users of Monthlybillz, an app for tracking all your SaaS subscriptions in one place (website: monthlybillz.com). This extension helps MonthlyBillz users to easily add their subscriptions directly from chrome browser, instead of manually adding in the app. For example,  if the user has their Trello and Airtable subscriptions, just clicking on the extension (while Trello and Airtable browser windows are open), captures the subscription name and gives an option for the user to update in their MonthlyBillz account.
Note: The extension can only be used by registered MonthlyBillz app users. Also, except for the app name and logo, nothing else is captured from browser windows.
